description: One of the most beautiful trails to Monadnock.  Follows a ridge for most of it's 15km (10 mile) distance and climbs about 500 meters (1600 feet).  Great views of the surrounding area especially in fall colors.
directions:
About 75 miles NW of Boston up HIway 3, then onto Hiway 101 to the town of Dublin, NH.  Trail starts along the SE side of DUblin Pond and goes SSW.  Head for the Hill.
Very limited parking.
title: Pompelli Trail
